thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com | 12 of 186
thread.title: Paula
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Paula

author: Paula
title: Paula
text: After finding out that my Valentine's Day delivery had not gone out as planned, I called and spoke to a very apologetic and kind representative who assured me it would arrive the next day but that they would reimburse me. These things happen but I respect a company who will make it right at their expense. Your integrity is more impressive than the random mistake that could happen to anyone.
